article.Heading: Countdown begins: 'Budget Caravan' in Sanand, Gujarat
article.Summary: In the second part of CNBC-TV18's Budget Caravan series, Farah Bookwala Vhora travels to one such village and is astonished by its transformation and that of its people.
article.Body:
It's been eight years since Tata Motors drove into Sanand and kick-started industrialization. Since then, the Gujarat government has acquired more than 10,500 acres of land in surrounding villages, bringing them windfall gains.

In the second part of CNBC-TV18's Budget Caravan series, Farah Bookwala Vhora travels to one such village and is astonished by its transformation and that of its people.

Watch video for more
